intro: Anneslia interior, commonly known as the interior anneslia, is a flowering plant native to the western United States. It belongs to the family Boraginaceae and is characterized by its hairy, glandular leaves and showy blue to violet flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in full sun. It is often found in arid environments, such as deserts and grasslands. Anneslia interior is a perennial herb that produces small, capsule-like fruits containing its seeds.
